caption.p: ( a) Dendogram of the EO constituents of S. kitaibelii from this study and from literature reports (the samples are marked according to Table 3); ( b) correlation network based on S. kitaibelii EO constituents (P-CYM— p-cymene; CRV—Carvacrol; A-PIN— α-pinene; LIM—limonene; SAB-H— cis-sabinene hydrate; T-4-OL—terpinen-4-ol; LIN—linalool; BOR—borneol; GER—geraniol; B-BRB— β-bourbonene; B-CAR— β-caryophyllene; SPA—spathulenol; CAR-O—caryophyllene oxide).
